content:
It sounds like you had a good rest after your long journey to Tokyo.

March 10th is a great time to visit Tokyo, as the weather is usually mild and comfortable, with temperatures ranging from 10°C to 17°C (50°F to 63°F). It's an excellent time to explore the city's outdoor attractions, such as the Meiji Shrine and the Imperial Palace East Garden.

Since you arrived at your Airbnb around 10 pm, you must have been eager to get some rest before starting your Tokyo adventure. Did you have a good night's sleep, and were you feeling refreshed and ready to take on the city the next day?

What were your plans for your first full day in Tokyo? Did you have a particular area or attraction in mind that you wanted to visit, or did you want to take it easy and see where the day took you?
